#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Requirements =
  * OpenSUSE 11.1 DVD
  * Pre-prepared Autoyast file.  Currently not described here.

= Autoyast with standard SUSE DVD=
  # Boot from OpenSUSE 11.1 DVD
  # Press "Esc" at boot menu within 2 seconds
  # Enter following kernel parameter very CAREFULLY: *install=cdrom:// autoyast= *_one of the following:_
    * *http://so-class2.googlecode.com/files/autoyast-file.xml * _sub in correct name for autoyast-file.xml_
    * *floppy:///_autoyast-file_.xml *  _sub in correct autoyast filename in root of floppy _
    * *device://_usb-device_/_autoyast-file_.xml *  _e.g. usb-device=sdb1 _
    E.g. *install=cdrom:// autoyast=http://so-class2.googlecode.com/files/ay-ren-081229-1.xml * <br>
    _Warning: If you enter this parameter incorrectly _ you will have to begin the installation from scratch and will not find out until some way into the process.
  # Continue with installation
